description.raw:
* Created new branch camera\_optical\_frame
* Update sensor model with sensor optical frame 
* Add name\_link\_optical  joint to match tf frame 
* Add joint that encodes transform between sensor and optical frame \*
* Modify sensor frame to add namespace. This ensures compatibility with localisation example

Usage:

```
roslaunch vrx_gazebo vrx.launch

roslaunch wamv_gazebo localization.launch

rviz
```

Add a camera visualisation to rviz.  Rviz should automatically add 3d objects to the camera visualisation using transforms and camera projection information.

This should resolve issue #140

Regards,

Jonathan.

‌

rviz

Add a camera visualisation to rviz. Rviz should automatically add 3d objects to the camera visualisation using transforms and camera projection information.

This should resolve issue #140
